channel.title: Music – JAY B
channel.description: Recent content in JAY B on Music

item.title: JAY B - Fountain of Youth
item.description:
They said boys shouldn’t ever cry
Tears aren’t meant for eyes like mine
Turn my cloud into sunshine
That’s what they told us
that’s what they told us oh yeah
We’re like the rain in June and April
Oh Heaven’s missin’ fallen angels
I never had a crew this true before
The way we hang out all night
I’ve never felt so alive
You’ve got me here for a thousand nights and days
Love you guys no matter what they say
I’m never growing up
Forever young and dumb
We’re all I need and more and yeah that’s the truth
Yeah this is my fountain of youth
We’re never growing old
Forever good as gold
We’re all I need and more and yeah that’s the truth
Yeah this my fountain of Youth
Fountain of youth yeah this my fountain of youth
We’re standing on stardust
don’t wanna come down
So what I know just us and hope is abound
You’ve got me here for a thousand nights and days
Love you guys no matter what they say
I’m never growing up
Forever young and dumb
We’re all I need and more and yeah that’s the truth
Yeah this is my fountain of youth
We’re never growing old
Forever good as gold
We’re all I need and more and yeah that’s the truth
Yeah this my fountain of Youth
Forever young forever us
Yeah we’re gonna live until we’re done
So don’t ever be scared cause we’ll fight for you
Always and forever
I’m never growing up
Forever young and dumb
We’re all I need and more and yeah that’s the truth
Yeah this is my fountain of youth
We’re never growing old
Forever good as gold
We’re all I need and more and yeah that’s the truth
Yeah this my fountain of Youth
Fountain of youth yeah this my fountain of youth

item.title: JAY B - go UP
item.description:
Get down, huh(Get on down)
Get down, huh(Get on down)
Get down, huh(Get on down)
Get down, huh(Get on down)

사는 게 뭔지 Got a question mark
복잡한 도시, 숨이 막히네
So hot, so damp, 이젠 못참겠어
Let me be free
난 원래 자유롭게 태어난 놈이니

월화수목금토일 반복되는 굴레 속
십만, 백만, 천만, 억 숫자만 셀래?
암만 눈칠 줘도 나는
Don’t even care what they said
Imma be your Kendrick,
can you please, don’t kill my vibe

Yes, we go up, if we let ‘em down
난 가벼워 다시 춤을 춰(Everybody)
마음 가는 대로 오늘만은 자신을 놓아봐
뭐가 두려워? 그럴 수록
Let ‘em down, down, down

쉬운 건 없어 그만큼 재밌지
계속 부딪혀 처음같이
If we get it yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yeah
목이 터져라 맘껏 소리 질러 봐

월화수목금토일 반복되는 굴레 속
십만, 백만, 천만, 억 숫자만 셀래?
암만 눈칠 줘도 나는
Don’t even care what they said
Imma be your Kendrick,
can you please, don’t kill my vibe

Yes, we go up, if we let ‘em down
난 가벼워 다시 춤을 춰(Everybody)
마음 가는 대로 오늘만은 자신을 놓아봐
뭐가 두려워? 그럴 수록
Let ‘em down, down, down

Yes, we go up, if we let ‘em down
난 가벼워 다시 춤을 춰(Everybody)
마음 가는 대로 오늘만은 자신을 놓아봐
